Title: Collecting a Concoction
Description:
The Pale Weavelashers did indeed throw my alchemical supply down the cliffside. The potions will give the citizens of the Silken Ward the edge they need to rise up.

I need someone to go down the Whispering Cliffs and collect any bottles that haven't broken open. I would go myself but the kobyss have made the area a hunting ground and I'm no fighter.

This would be a simple task for one such as yourself, eh?
ObjectivesText: Collect 8 Brightshade Potions in the Whispering Cliffs.
CompletionText: The kobyss are beyond a nuisance. I need to get my Brightshade Potions back.
RewardText: I hope you got my Brightshade Potions, eh? Without them I've got nothing left.
